function_category: Scoring with Machine Learning Engine Models
short_description: Predict document categories by a trained naive Bayes text classifier model.
long_description: Predict document categories by a trained naive Bayes text classifier model.

input_tables.name: PredictorValues
input_tables.rDescription: The table defining the token table for prediction.
input_tables.description: The table defining the token table for prediction.

input_tables.name: Model
input_tables.rDescription: The table defining table classification model.
input_tables.description: The table defining table classification model.

argument_clauses.name: InputTokenColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input_table column that contains the tokens.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input_table column that contains the tokens.

argument_clauses.name: DocIdColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the input_table columns that contain the document identifier.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the input_table columns that contain the document identifier.

argument_clauses.name: ModelTokenColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the model_table column that contains the tokens. The default value is the first column of model_table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the model_table column that contains the tokens. The default value is the first column of model_table.

argument_clauses.name: ModelCategoryColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the model_table column that contains the prediction categories. The default value is the second column of model_table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the model_table column that contains the prediction categories. The default value is the second column of model_table.

argument_clauses.name: ModelProbColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the model_table column that contains the token counts. The default value is the third column of model_table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the model_table column that contains the token counts. The default value is the third column of model_table.

argument_clauses.name: ModelType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the model type of the text classifier. The default value is 'Multinomial'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the model type of the text classifier. The default value is 'Multinomial'.

argument_clauses.name: TopK
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the number of most likely prediction categories to output with their loglikelihood values (for example, the top 10 most likely prediction categories). The default is all prediction categories.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of most likely prediction categories to output with their loglikelihood values (for example, the top 10 most likely prediction categories). The default is all prediction categories.
